DOC.detailed_description: Heroin highly addictive drug , abuse medical social consequence . ORLAAM approve treat opiate narcotic dependence . The purpose study determine efficacy ORLAAM treat heroin dependent individual . In addition , study determine effective dose regimen ORLAAM . This study last 20 week . Participants randomly assign receive one three dose condition : 1 ) standard fix dose , 2 ) dose-by-weight , 3 ) dose effect . The dose effect condition include dose ORLAAM dependent opiate use withdrawal symptom associate opiate use ; dos may adjust throughout study . All participant receive cognitive behavioral therapy throughout study .
